sentences.sentence: In the roadside teashops, men in longyis sit on low stools. They talk over sweet milky tea and acrid cheroot cigarettes.
sentences.translation: 街边茶馆里，包着头巾的男人们坐在矮凳上。他们喝着甜奶茶，抽着辛辣的方头雪茄烟交谈。

sentences.sentence: I'm trying to buy some cheroot.
Or he will offer to walk you there and save a franc or two, knowing very well that it will be necessary to pass a tabac on the way and that you will please be so good as to buy me a little cheroot.
sentences.translation: 他或许会主动提出步行送你去，节省一两个法郎，因为他很清楚途中一定会路过一家烟铺，你只好给他买一支雪茄。
